mapper.select: SELECT ol.order_id,pr.product_name,ol.order_totalpayment,ol.order_date,ol.order_state FROM order_detail AS od INNER JOIN product AS pr ON od.product_id = pr.product_id INNER JOIN order_list AS ol ON od.order_id = ol.order_id ORDER BY ol.order_id desc
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET member_index = null,post_subject = #{post_subject},post_content = #{post_content}, post_attach1 = #{post_attach1},post_attach2 = #{post_attach2},register_date = now() WHERE post_id = #{post_id}
